issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
In the file 
/.titanium/mobilesdk/linux/3.5.0.GA/module/android/build.xml

this path no exist
<property name="docs" location="${build}/docs"/> 
	
change for
<property name="docs" location="${ti.module.root}/documentation"/>

comments.body:
Hi

I am afraid you need explain more about your case, like how to reproduce, what is the symptom, and the simple test case. 

Regards,
Shuo
